review.summary: A clean, minimal __init__.py file that serves as the public API export point for event request models. The file follows neo-commons Maximum Separation Architecture by exporting only the single CreateEventRequest model. The code is well-documented with clear purpose statement and follows all project conventions perfectly.

positive_observations.observation: Perfect adherence to neo-commons Maximum Separation Architecture with single-purpose file
Comprehensive __all__ list provides explicit public API control
Clear documentation with purpose statement and architectural context
Clean relative import pattern following project conventions
Minimal and focused - exactly what an __init__.py should be

context.tests: No tests needed - this is a simple export file
context.documentation: Well-documented with clear docstring explaining purpose and architecture
